title: Law determining the Organisation and Functioning of Faith-Based Organisations
title_en: Law determining the Organisation and Functioning of Faith-Based Organisations

provisions.title: Article 50 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. Kigali, on 31/08/2018 (sé) KAGAME Paul President of the Republic (sé) Dr. NGIRENTE Edouard Prime Minister Seen and sealed with the Seal of the Republic: (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice /Attorney General
